transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji bataye madam.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha ji madam aawaz nahi aa rahi kya?
Customer: Aa rahi hai aa rahi hai sir bataiye.
Executive: Ji bataye.
Customer: Bulai thi madam aapki.
Customer: Haan haan main wo connect hi kar rahi thi but se abhi batao ki kya haan kya issue ho raha hai?
Executive: Issue wohi ho raha hai abhi kuch din pehle to kuch inquiry vagera aa rahi thi ab to bilkul hi band ho gaya hai.
Executive: Dekho sir maine yaha pe check kiya hai aapka thik hai to by leads team se aapko inquiry milti hai thik hai to main aapka portal login karke baithi hui hu us din bhi maine aapko bataya tha ki hum jab tak customer khud se kuch bhi nahi bolta na tab tak koi bhi changes nahi kar sakta matlab jo IndiaMART mein aapka account handle kar raha hoga na wo bhi kuch bhi changes nahi kar sakta thik hai to aaj subah meri manager se bhi discuss ho raha tha ki matlab aap keh rahe the na aapko inquiry nahi mil rahi to maine unhe bataya tha ki sir keh rahe the ki jab se TST ki baat hui hai uske baad se inquiry nahi aa rahi hai to wohi unhone mujhe aapka portal login karke dikhaya tha jahan se calls vagera aur directly message vagera jate hai na by leads vagera ji to unhone apne app pe open karke dikhaya tha jab hamari subah team meeting ho rahi thi to unhone kaha tha ki sir ka kaam proper tarike se hai last month week bhi unko 21 inquiry mili hai usse do se aath mein 17 inquiry mili hai thik hai to unke pass 17 12 ka ratio hai aisa nahi hai ki inquiry nahi gayi hai inquiry ja rahi hai sir ke pass thik hai ab aap ye keh rahe ho ki ha aapke related nahi hai wo cheez alag hai lekin baki inquiry to sir aapke pass ja rahi hai thik hai
Customer: To madam jo mera kaam jo meri cheez hai uski inquiry ko manunga ya main all Indians jo item hai dusre other items hai main unke bare mein bhai main kya keh sakta hu aap befuzuli mein main kisi ko bagair matlab mein message karta rahu din ba din daily 100 message karu ab wo samne wale ko koi cheez use chahiye nahi fir bhi use kya fayda mil raha hai mujhse to fir aur ulta aur bakchodi karega aadmi samne wala ulta baat karega ki bhai jab main tumhari cheez ko main lena nahi chah raha jab main baat nahi kar raha aapki cheez ka aur aap mujhe message pe message dal rahe ho fir usse kya fayda mil nikal raha hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm
Executive: Abhi dekhiye sir itni ye ho sakta hai aapka ki dekhiye aisa nahi hai ki aapka koi catalog aapka catalog ka maine aapko ek ek cheez dikhai hai thik hai sa yaha pe jitni bhi inquiry aati hai sir thik hai aapke jo catalog mein updated hota hai uske behalf pe rehta hai thik hai ye nahi hai ki koi alag se bana ke de rahi hu aapko inquiry aap jo keyword update karoge us behalf pe aapko inquiry aapke portal pe aayegi thik hai ab aapka chandelier se related hai ab aapne kaha ki dekhiye wo cheez main aapki samajhti hu aapne kaha tha ki 25000 wala port mere pass nahi aa raha lekin maine aapko ye to dikhaya tha na ki aisa nahi hai ki option nahi hai aapke pass dikh raha aapka agar main yaha pe 50000 se upar ka filter lagati hu jana electrical ka to mere pass ek inquiry aa rahi hai ek minute hold karna main aapko mere pass show nahi aa raha iska fir mere pass koi bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi jo mere regarding hai mere kaam ke purpose se main aapko dikha deti hu ek hanging crystal ki aayi hai Kerala se 10 pieces ki ek minute rukiye main aapko show kar deti hu ek second ek kaam karti hu sir main aapko video meeting ka link bhejti hu hai na ha ab batao kab tak bheju fir kab free hoge abhi main free hounga 2 baje ke baad 2:15 baje 2:15 baje ke baad free hoge aap ha abhi 15 minute free hu bas acha acha ji 15 minute free hai ek minute hold karo kyuki main ye dekhna chah rahi thi kyuki aapke pass jo inquiry aa rahi hai na wo inquiry aapke aapko jo main bhejti hu link wo kehte ho aap open nahi hoti aisa kuch issue rehta hai na ha ji aapko dikhta nahi hai na wo inquiry usme matlab aapke portal mein chaliye koi dikkat nahi hai main aapko 2 baje ke baad phone karti hu ek minute video meeting link bhejungi ek bar check kar lenge thik hai 2:15 baje ke baad thik hai bhai uske baad rahe hum to bhai hum to bas wo jo kehte hai ki bhai pareshan ho kar ke har kar ke jo baith jate hai usi tarike se baithe hue hai hum to nahi sir isme kya aur ho sakta hai to karte hai aisa nahi hai thik hai sorry madam kab hoga 6 mahine ho sakta hai 6 mahine ho gaye ho ya aur bhi jyada bhi ho gaye ho abhi tak to kuch hua nahi hmm thik hai jaisa payment nahi ho jayega pata nahi madam kab hoga dekh koi nahi main karti hu aapko connect fir hai na thik hai thik hai madam thik thik hai sir okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Customer says the video link doesn't open.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's portal.

- Executive confirmed inquiries are being received.

- Executive offered a video meeting to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 2:15 PM with video link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, video call, portal
